package.name: acceleration_path_planner_basic
package.description:
The handler detects the completition of the mission and publishes the target/max velocity Meanwhile the path planner only publishes the path. This is a basic version of the acceleration path planner it only publishes a straight line path.
The division of the path planner and the handler is done to allow the path planner to be changed to a more complex one without changing the handler.
